name: 790 on George
description:
Come on in and stay with the 790 family. 790 on George is located in the heart of Sydney CBD on its historic George Street just a stone throw from the cities Chinatown and conveniently positioned just a few minutes from Central 

Station with access to trains and buses at all hours.

? Free WiFi throughout the building, available in the common areas as well as in every room.
? Free air conditioning in every room to ensure you make it through those hot summer nights.
? Free access to our common rooms. Where you can hang out with travelers, catch a movie, play a game of pool, or simply relax on our comfy bean bags.
? Free access to our fully stocked kitchen from early morning until 11 pm. Where you can rustle up a storm or sit and relax with one of the many takeaways available around us.
? Free lockers with universal plugs in each and every one to ensure your belongings are safe in your room and your electronics are charged.
? Individual reading lights on every bed in our 6 and 4 share dorms. Keep reading or working without keeping your roommates up!
? Free baggage storage after you checkout in our CCTV monitored TV area in the kitchen.
? Free events to help you meet travelers from all over the world, or a few drinks before you hit one of Sydney's many clubs, some of which are located right on our doorstep.
? Checkout time is at 11 am to ensure you get that extra bit of sleep before moving onto your next location. We also aim to check you in as soon as possible, no matter the time of day, and can guarantee to check in by 3 pm.
? Free maps guided city tours daily just a short walk from your door.

Our friendly, approachable reception staff are available 24/7 to assist you with any issues you may have, at any time. Most of our staff have lived in Sydney for many years, so you can rely on us for a wealth of insider knowledge on Sydney and its events. Got a question? Don't be afraid to ask!

We operate a strict cleaning schedule to ensure our facilities are in perfect condition and as mentioned above our staff are on hand 24/7 to combat any issues swiftly. The building is monitored by CCTV cameras throughout so you can rest easy that you and your belongings are safe at all times.

On behalf of all of us here at 790 on George, we look forward to seeing you, welcome to your home away from home.

Please Note: a $10 key deposit is required on check-in for every guest and bookings of more than two people cannot be guaranteed in the same room though we will always do our best to accommodate your requests.

houseRules.notes:
Here at 790 on George we need to look after all our guests and make sure everybody is safe.
In accordance with government guidelines to minimise transmission of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), we can only accept guests that follow our inhouse regulations. 
On arrival at 790 on George, the team, may request additional documentation from guests to validate identity, travel itinerary and other relevant information, during dates where such guidelines exist.
*Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

Due to various factors our Dorm Rooms best cater to guests between 18-35 years old. 
If you are not within this age group  we have other alternatives available.

Free WiFi in every room

Valid ID upon arrival.

Friendly!
Independent!
Clean with Everything you need!
A Perfect place for all nationalities!
Best Prices for top grade Hostel in Sydney!

$10.00 key deposit is required from each person upon check in. 

New Year Reservations: All reservations need to start on the 26th December. Reservations are to be secured by prepayment or guaranteed by credit card. Credit card will be charged in full between 1st December and date of arrival. Credit cards which decline will have their reservations cancelled. 

No changes will be accepted for New Year bookings after the 1st December. 
Cancellations after the 1st December (and before arrival date) will incur a penalty equal to that of your accommodation. No refunds or transfers will be given.
All non refundable bookings will be charged upon booking. 

We have a 1 day cancellation policy, unless otherwise specified as part of a special package
